alert.note: Alert for Iron (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued April 15 at 8:31PM EDT until further notice by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 PM EDT/930 PM CDT/ THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central Upper Michigan, including the following counties, Baraga and Iron. * WHEN...Until 1030 PM EDT /930 PM CDT/. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 831 PM EDT /731 PM CDT/, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Covington, Three Lakes, U.S. 141 between Covington and Amasa, Ned Lake, King Lake, Bone Lake, Craig Lake State Park and Herman. - www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
